languages.text:
Приняв предложение Вольного Торговца и став {mf|его|ее} достойным консортом, Соломон Антар более никогда не позволял никому вновь встать между ним и его любовью.
Однажды Соломон отправился в рейд на пиратов, а вернулся в сопровождении трех сирот нежного возраста, освобожденных им из плена. Проникнувшись к ним теплотой, Соломон вместе с Вольным Торговцем занялся их воспитанием. Под мудрой и полной любви опекой трое детей превратились в могучих и талантливых людей, чьи деяния не раз потрясали Простор Коронус. А любовь арбитра и Лорд-капитана пусть более никогда и не принадлежала лишь им двоим, но ни разу в жизни они не испытывали недостатка в ней.

After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.
Once, Solomorne went on a pirate hunt and came back accompanied by three orphans of a delicate age — captives whom he had rescued. He and the Rogue Trader developed an affection for the youngsters, and took it upon themselves to raise them. Under their wise and devoted care, the three children grew up to become adults of great talent, whose deeds astounded the Koronus Expanse on many occasions. And although the love between the Arbitrator and the Lord Captain was no longer theirs alone, they never felt a lack of it.

traits.locale_text:
After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.
Once, Solomorne went on a pirate hunt and came back accompanied by three orphans of a delicate age, who were captives he had rescued. Solomorne and the Rogue Trader developed an affection for them, and took it upon themselves to raise them. Under their wise and loving care, the three children turned into people of great talent and wisdom whose deeds amazed the Koronus Expanse on many occasions. And although the love between the Arbitrator and the Lord Captain was no longer theirs alone, they would never feel a lack of it.

After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.

languages.text:
Nachdem er den Antrag {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angenommen hatte und {mf|sein|ihr} würdiger Gatte geworden war, ließ Solomorne nie wieder jemanden zwischen ihn und seine Liebe treten.
Einmal ging Solomorne auf Piratenjagd und kam mit drei jungen Waisen zurück – Gefangene, die er gerettet hatte. Er und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entwickelten Zuneigung zu den Kindern und nahmen sie bei sich auf. Unter ihrer klugen und hingebungsvollen Fürsorge wurden aus den dreien überaus fähige Erwachsene, deren Taten die Koronus-Ausdehnung bei vielen Gelegenheiten erstaunten. Und obwohl die Liebe zwischen dem Arbitrator und dem Lord Captain nicht mehr ihnen alleine gehörte, empfanden sie das nie als Mangel.

languages.text:
Après avoir accepté la demande en mariage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et être devenu son époux, Solomorne ne laissa plus rien ni personne s'interposer entre eux.
Un jour, Solomorne revint d'une chasse aux pirates accompagné de trois orphelins qu'il avait libérés de captivité. Avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, ils se prirent d'affection pour les petits et se mirent en devoir de les élever. Élevés avec amour et sagesse, les trois enfants devinrent des adultes dotés de multiples talents et dont les exploits stupéfièrent à plus d'une reprise les Étendues de Koronus. Et même si l'arbitrator et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} durent à dater de l'arrivée de leurs enfants d'adoption partager leur amour, ils n'eurent jamais le sentiment d'en manquer.

languages.text:
索罗蒙接受了行商浪人的求婚，成为了{mf|他|她}值得信赖的配偶。在这之后，他再也不允许任何人介入他和他的爱人之间。
某次，索罗蒙外出狩猎海盗，回来时身边多出了三个年幼的孤儿。这几个孩子都是索罗蒙从海盗船上救出来的俘虏。索罗蒙与行商浪人对这些孩子产生了感情，承担起抚养他们的责任。在两人充满智慧与关怀的抚养下，三个孩子渐渐长大成人，全都成为了才智过人的杰出人物，完成了许多令整个科罗努斯扩区大为惊叹的卓著功绩。尽管索罗蒙与行商浪人将一部分爱分给了孩子们，但两人之间的爱意却一如既往。
languages.original_text:
After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.
Once, Solomorne went on a pirate hunt and came back accompanied by three orphans of a delicate age — captives whom he had rescued. Under their wise and devoted care, the three children grew up to become adults of great talent, whose deeds astounded the Koronus Expanse on many occasions. And although the love between the Arbitrator and the Lord Captain was no longer theirs alone, they never felt a lack of it.

索罗蒙接受了行商浪人的求婚，成为了{mf|他|她}值得信赖的配偶。在这之后，他再也不允许任何人介入他和他的爱人之间。
某次，索罗蒙外出狩猎海盗，回来时身边多出了三个年幼的孤儿。这几个孩子都是索罗蒙从海盗船上救出来的俘虏。索罗蒙与行商浪人对这些孩子产生了感情，承担起抚养他们的责任。在两人充满智慧与爱意的抚养之下，三个孩子渐渐长大成人，全都成为了才学过人、智慧超群的英雄人物，成就了许多令整个科罗努斯扩区大为惊叹的卓著功绩。尽管索罗蒙与行商浪人将一部分爱分给了孩子们，但两人之间的爱意却一如既往。

languages.text:
Tras aceptar la propuesta de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y convertirse en su digno consorte, Solomorne jamás permitió que nadie volviera a interponerse entre su amor y él.
Una vez, Solomorne fue a cazar piratas y volvió acompañado de tres huérfanos muy jóvenes que mantenían prisioneros. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y él se encariñaron de los muchachos y se encargaron de criarlos. Bajo sus cuidados sabios y dedicados, los tres niños se convirtieron en adultos de gran talento, cuyos actos sorprendieron a la Extensión de Koronus en diversas ocasiones. Aunque el amor entre el Arbitrator y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ya no era solo de la pareja, nunca les faltó en absoluto.
languages.original_text:
After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.
Once, Solomorne went on a pirate hunt and came back accompanied by three orphans of a delicate age — captives whom he had rescued. He and the Rogue Trader developed an affection for the youngsters, and took it upon themselves to raise them. Under their wise and devoted care, the three children grew up to become adults of great talent, whose deeds astounded the Koronus Expanse on many occasions. And although the love between the Arbitrator and the Lord Captain was no longer theirs alone, they never felt a lack of it.

languages.text:
ローグトレーダーの告白を受け入れて{mf|彼|彼女}にふさわしい伴侶となったソロモーンは、それ以来、自分と愛する人の間に誰も入れることはなかった。
ある日ソロモーンは海賊狩りに出かけ、繊細な年頃の孤児三人を連れて帰った―彼が救い出した捕虜たちである。彼とローグトレーダーはその子どもたちに愛情を抱き、育てることを自らの責務とした。二人の賢明で献身的な世話のもと、三人の子どもたちは大いなる才能を持つ成人へと成長し、その活躍はコロヌス・エクスパンスを何度も驚かせた。そして、アービトレイターとロード・キャプテンの間の愛はもはや二人だけのものではなかったが、彼らは決して愛の欠如を感じることはなかった。
languages.original_text:
After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.
Once, Solomorne went on a pirate hunt and came back accompanied by three orphans of a delicate age — captives whom he had rescued. He and the Rogue Trader developed an affection for the youngsters, and took it upon themselves to raise them. Under their wise and devoted care, the three children grew up to become adults of great talent, whose deeds astounded the Koronus Expanse on many occasions. And although the love between the Arbitrator and the Lord Captain was no longer theirs alone, they never felt a lack of it.

traits.locale_text:

ある日ソロモーンは海賊狩りに出かけ、繊細な年頃の孤児三人を連れて帰った―彼が救い出した捕虜たちである。彼とローグトレーダーはその子どもたちに愛情を抱き、育てることを自らの責務とした。二人の賢明で献身的な世話のもと、三人の子どもたちは大いなる才能を持つ成人へと成長し、その活躍はコロヌス・エクスパンスを何度も驚かせた。そして、アービトレイターとロード・キャプテンの間の愛はもはや二人だけのものではなかったが、彼らは決して愛の欠如を感じることはなかった。

languages.text:
Hür Tacir'in teklifini kabul edip ona yaraşır bir can yoldaşı olan Solomorne, bir daha hiç kimsenin kendisiyle aşkının arasına girmesine müsaade etmedi.
Bir keresinde Solomorne, bir korsan avına çıktı ve av sırasında kurtardığı üç körpe yetimle çıkageldi. Hür Tacir'le birlikte bu miniklere karşı derin bir şefkat beslemeye başladılar ve onları bizzat kendi himayelerinde büyütmeye karar verdiler. Onların bilgece ve özverili bakımıyla yetişen bu üç çocuk, zamanla engin yeteneklere sahip bireyler oldu ve büyük başarılarda bulunup Koronus Enginliği'ni defalarca kendilerine hayran bıraktılar. Artık Yargıcı ile Lord Kaptan arasındaki o derin sevgiye ortak olan başkaları vardı ancak yüreklerindeki bu sevginin zerre azaldığını hissetmediler.
languages.original_text:
After accepting the Rogue Trader's proposal and becoming {mf|his|her} worthy consort, Solomorne never let anyone stand between him and his love again.
Once, Solomorne went on a pirate hunt and came back accompanied by three orphans of a delicate age — captives whom he had rescued. He and the Rogue Trader developed an affection for the youngsters, and took it upon themselves to raise them. Under their wise and devoted care, the three children grew up to become adults of great talent, whose deeds astounded the Koronus Expanse on many occasions. And although the love between the Arbitrator and the Lord Captain was no longer theirs alone, they never felt a lack of it.

traits.locale_text:
Hür Tacir'in teklifini kabul edip ona yaraşır bir can yoldaşı olan Solomorne, bir daha hiç kimsenin kendisiyle aşkının arasına girmesine müsaade etmedi.
Bir vakit Solomorne bir korsan avına çıktı ve av sırasında kurtardığı üç körpe yetimle çıkageldi. Hür Tacir'le birlikte bu miniklere karşı derin bir şefkat beslemeye başladılar ve onları bizzat kendi himayelerinde büyütmeye karar verdiler. Onların bilgece ve özverili bakımıyla yetişen bu üç çocuk, zamanla engin yeteneklere sahip bireyler oldu ve büyük başarılarda bulunup Koronus Enginliği'ni defalarca kendilerine hayran bıraktılar. Artık Yargıcı ile Lord Kaptan'ın arasındaki o derin sevgiye ortak olan başkaları vardı ancak yüreklerindeki bu sevginin zerre azaldığını hissetmediler.
